scripts.prod: source .env && export MAILGUN_API_KEY=$MAILGUN_API_KEY && export DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY && docker compose up --build
scripts.dev: source .env && export MAILGUN_API_KEY=$MAILGUN_API_KEY && export DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY && docker compose -f compose.dev.yaml up --build
